text: Godfried Theodore Patrick Toussaint (1944 â€“ July 2019) was a Canadian computer scientist. He was a Professor of Computer Science, and the Head of the Computer Science Program at New York University Abu Dhabi (NYUAD).New York University Abu Dhabi He did research on many aspects of computational geometry and discrete geometry.G. Toussaint profile at McGill University He was a co- founder of the Annual ACM Symposium on Computational Geometry, and the annual Canadian Conference on Computational Geometry. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Canadian computer scientists
title: Godfried Toussaint
